context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard stats parity feature is complete. Key behaviors verified: 1) Dashboard /api/admin/dashboard/stats returns counts using {is_deleted: {$ne: true}} filter matching list page defaults. 2) Products and Gallery counts use {} filter (no is_deleted field on those collections). 3) All list endpoints support ?include_deleted=true query param. 4) Frontend AdminDashboard.js fetches recent activity with include_deleted=true for all 5 sources. 5) Activity items show PENDING badge (yellow) when status='pending' and DELETED badge (red) when is_deleted=true. 6) Items can have both badges. 7) Deleted items have opacity-60 class for visual dimming.
